column2: I had my own dreams once... Then the Federation branded me a derelict.
Now I’ll never get to see my dreams come true!
Hee hee hee... Yes, that’s it... I can just wait for the town—no, the whole world to be ruined!
Then being a derelict won’t mean a thing! I’ll be able to pursue my dreams again... Heh heh, ha ha!
Did you hear the news? The Federation is gone for good now.
Now I can finally get back to pursuing my dreams. Heh...
